column4: It's been a long while since I had my screensaver lock-up on me, I think it was the beta NVidia drivers days.
I just use cpu freq scaling to lower the CPU burn.
heh.
Eesh, I've got all you guys beat with my OSX machine.
14:29  up 8 days, 12:35, 3 users, load averages: 0.93 0.57 0.59
mahahaha
Ya, well, this _is_ OSX ...
OSX isn't the most efficient OS, unfortunately.
But then, I do have a shit-load of apps running.
Not all OSs have as many kernel updates as Linux, for example.
most just don't acknowledge them, afaict
- Well, ya, there's also that.
- What did he do?
dcc chat
- You can make someone leave a channel, without kicking, on this ircd?
yes
- What's the point, versus a kick?
it's silly, but it tends to not trigger people's auto-rejoin scripts
hah, I'm in screen, but I always forget the cut'n'paste keys
- ^A-ESC, vi keys to navigate, space to mark, then space again to copy and exit. ^A-]  to paste. ;]
